name: Party Quest
description:
"Party Quest: Never Go It Alone" is in the style of a classic top-down RPG. You play as one of three different classes and embark on a great journey to save the Kingdom of Ludum from the domesticated pest that has plagued the land. But wait, you are alone! You must find a suitable party of warriors before you can save the land! Good luck!

By Josh Maggard (@MaggardJosh) - Programming
Denver Poteet (@DenverSkyline) - Art

for Ludum Dare 22
